net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.moveset
Class Moveset

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.moveset.Moveset

public class Moveset
extends java.lang.Object

A moveset is the moves the hero can currently perform. These are usually mapped to action keys. A quick overview: raw -> input buttons -> commands -> moves.

Field Summary
protected  MovesetSchema mdo
           
protected  java.util.Map<InputCommand,Actionable> moves

Method Summary
 void act(InputCommand command, Level map)
          Acts according to the input command by mapping it into the moveset.

Field Detail

mdo

protected MovesetSchema mdo

moves

protected java.util.Map<InputCommand,Actionable> moves
Constructor Detail

Moveset

public Moveset()
Creates and initializes a ne blank moveset. Make sure to manually add moves or else the hero won't be able to do anything.

Moveset

public Moveset(MovesetSchema mdo)
Creates and initializes a new moveset. It's fine to do things like change movesets on the fly as the hero gains and loses moves, but this is one way to create it from data.

Parameters:
mdo - The data object to initialize from
Method Detail

act

public void act(InputCommand command,
                Level map)
Acts according to the input command by mapping it into the moveset.

Parameters:
command - The command to respond to
map - The map to act on
